mapper.update: update exp_comment set exp_id = #{expId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chat_content = #{chatContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select comment_id, exp_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at, chat_content from exp_comment
